text: "Amazing" (also referred to as "More than Amazing") is a song by Irish boy band Westlife. It was released on 20 February 2006 as the third and final single from their sixth studio album, Face to Face (2005). The song peaked at number four on the UK Singles Chart. It debuted with 16,316 sales in the UK alone. ==Tours performed at== * Face to Face Tour (2006) * The Love Tour (2007) ==Track listing== UK CD1 # "Amazing" (Single Mix) – 2:52 # "Still Here" – 3:51 UK CD2 # "Amazing" (Single Mix) – 2:52 # "Miss You When I'm Dreaming" – 4:06 # "Exclusive Westlife Chat" – 11:05 ==Charts== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" !Chart (2006) !Peak position |- |- !scope="row"|Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) |14 |- |- |- !scope="row"|Russia (Tophit) |132 |- |- |- |- |} ==References== ==External links== *Official Westlife Website Category:2000s ballads Category:2005 songs Category:2006 singles Category:RCA Records singles Category:Songs written by Carl Falk Category:Songs written by Didrik Thott Category:Songs written by Jake Schulze Category:Songs written by Kristian Lundin Category:Songs written by Savan Kotecha Category:Songs written by Sebastian Thott Category:Sony BMG singles Category:Sony Music singles Category:Westlife songs
title: Amazing (Westlife song)
